rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance designed to welcome positive energy as per Vastu principles. Minimalistic Scandinavian design with ample natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living space adjacent to the kitchen area, featuring neutral tones and functional furniture layout.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for seamless dining experience; natural light from the north window.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional Scandinavian kitchen with modern appliances and efficient work triangle layout. North-facing for good lighting.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact guest bathroom with essential fixtures.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and north-facing window to promote relaxation and positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed for family use; maintains Scandinavian minimalism.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and functionality.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern en-suite bathroom for the master bedroom.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive rooftop terrace serving as a recreational and relaxation area. Designed to incorporate Scandinavian outdoor living aesthetics with minimal structural supports.

garage.description: Dual-car garage integrated within the ground floor layout, strategically placed on the West side of the plot to balance energy flow as per Vastu principles.

plot.description: A 40x60 feet plot oriented westward with a North-facing entrance, ensuring compliance with local building norms and Scandinavian design aesthetics combined with Vastu principles.
